Gee-Gees Promotion

Earlier this year, I created various social media templates to promote Gee-Gees games, highlight players and share important sports information.

Company

University of Ottawa

Date

July 2021 - Ongoing

Tags

Templates | Branding

Templates

I developed a wide range of social media templates for different uses, from athlete of the week and final scores. They are strategically built to be easily customized by anyone.

Game Day Posts

A large amount of templates were designed to promote all the team's games using the Gee-Gees brand and high quality photography.

Event Posters

The Game Day templates were adapted into posters and were placed accross campus to enhance promotion.

Graphic Library

While making the templates, I designed a graphics library with different elements such as labels, stamps and stickers that can be easily inserted in any design to add more Gee-Gees branded elements!
